SEARCH
Package fr.istic.aco.editor.Interface

Interface Memento

All Known Implementing Classes:
EditorMemento, InsertMemento, SelectMemento
public interface Memento
The Memento interface is a marker interface used to represent a memento object in the Memento design pattern. It is used for capturing and storing the state of an object so that it can be restored later. The memento can store state information of objects like Engine, Selection, or other components of the editor.

Classes implementing this interface should contain the necessary methods to capture and retrieve the state of an object.
